Description: Fragment of arched sistrum: richly decorated. The arch has been broken off on one side within the grooved socket on top of the capital, and the two fixing dowels can be seen; on the other side only the remains of the socket survive; at the base of the arch is a recumbent ram. The capital is decorated with nine uraei on the front, ten on the back, and five on each side, each with a sun disc. Below the capital is a double Hathor head; the wig is elaborately plaited and curled; the floral necklace has eight chains. There are two lateral uraei, one wearing the white crown, the other the red crown. The handle is cylindrical, with five tie-bands at the top, a feather pattern on each side, and a separate base-cap.
